attributes.contentHtml:
Lemme just state something quite clear:

  • Franxis owns BlockNode.cc discord server.
  • RusJS owns the domain.
  • I own the bot and manager some other shit
    RUS invited bad to join the host me Franxis and he started, we are trying to keep the host aflout and we will not let bad joining take the host down I have proof of payment for most of our nodes, I'm sure I can get it for the rest. If you wanna talk to me about this choice to include bad your welcome to DM me on discord, I don't like drama obviously, it ruins people's mental health. So ye, that my point.

attributes.title: ViaHost, Sryden, ExoHost, AltHost, HelioNodes, BlockNode | Bad/Layer
